content: If you get hit as the fox you will transform back into the monkey. Use the Snow Fox Brush to turn back into the fox again before entering the temple to complete her quest. The brush will be in your inventory after initiating the quest.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Non-Void_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Non-Void Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Non-Void Location'.
The content is as follows:
If you get hit as the fox you will transform back into the monkey. Use the Snow Fox Brush to turn back into the fox again before entering the temple to complete her quest. The brush will be in your inventory after initiating the quest.
